text: The 1940–41 NHL season was the 24th season of the National Hockey League. Seven teams each played 48 games. The Boston Bruins were the Stanley Cup winners as they beat the Detroit Red Wings four games to none in the final series. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== Note: GP = Games played, W = Wins, L
